snippet.title: Paper Mario 3D Land Trailer
snippet.description:
THE GAME IS OUT NOW! Download here:
https://phpbb.mfgg.net/viewtopic.php?f=8&t=16561

Trailer for my most recent game I'm working on, Paper Mario 3D Land. The game combines the gameplay of Super Mario 3D Land with the charming graphics of Paper Mario to create a familiar, yet unique experience. Additionally, there's all new power-ups like the Super Dandelion and the Mole Suit that help you bypass hard passages and find secrets.

This trailer was created by TsukaYuriko. Big thanks for the help! I'd tell you to go check out her stuff too, but she has no projects to showcase as of the time being.
